name: Employment sector of S&E highest degree holders, by level and field of highest degree: 2019
description: Employment sector of S&E highest degree holders, by level and field of highest degree: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: highest_degree_field_and_degree_level
variableMeasured.description: Highest degree field and degree level hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_business_or_industry_for_profit_businesses
variableMeasured.description: Business Or Industry For Profit Businesses

variableMeasured.name: field_business_or_industry_self_employed_unincorporated_businesses
variableMeasured.description: Business Or Industry Self Employed Unincorporated Businesses

notes: All S&E highest degree holders include professional degree holders not reported separately. The 2-year and precollege institutions include 2-year colleges and community colleges or technical institutes and preschool, elementary, middle, and secondary schools. The 4-year institutions include 4-year colleges or universities, medical schools, and university-affiliated research institutes. The education sector includes public and private institutions. Percentages may not add to 100% because of rounding. Numbers are rounded to the nearest 1,000.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Survey of College Graduates (NSCG), 2019.Science and Engineering Indicators
